vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11;
son of: Eliphaz (H0464);
brother of: Omar (H0201), Zepho (H6825), Gatam (H1609), Kenaz (H7073), Amalek (H6002H) and Korah (H7141H)
§ Teman = "south"
n pr m
1) son of Eliphaz, grandson of Esau, and one of the dukes of Edom
2) the tribe descended from 1 noted for the wisdom of its people
n pr loc
3) the region occupied by the descendants of 1, located east of Idumea
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   sur; viento del sur; (2a)   hijo de Elifaz, hijo de Esaú; pueblo, territorio; (2b)   jefe de Edom
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提幔 这个字在原文的意思是 "南方"
陽性專有名詞
1) 以利法之子, 以掃之孫, 以東的君王之一
2) 從(1) 而來的後裔; 以其人民的才智而聞名
地名專有名詞
3) 提幔的後裔所佔據的地區, 位於以土買東方
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
提幔 这个字在原文的意思是 "南方"
阳性专有名词
1) 以利法之子, 以扫之孙, 以东的君王之一
2) 从(1) 而来的后裔; 以其人民的才智而闻名
地名专有名词
3) 提幔的后裔所占据的地区, 位于以土买东方

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: te.ma.ni (תֵּימָנִי "Temanite" H8489)
§ Teman = "south"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) son of Eliphaz, grandson of Esau, and one of the dukes of Edom
2) the tribe descended from 1 noted for the wisdom of its people
n pr loc
3) the region occupied by the descendants of 1, located east of Idumea
